text:
On Enoshima Beach, basking in strong sunlight,
a voice called out to [Player].

name: Joezen
text:
Hello, [Player]-san!
I saw you passing by, so I called out to you.
Was I bothering you?

options.text: Are you done with the photoshoot already?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Joezen
dialogue_after_selection.text: Yes, the photoshoot reached a good stopping point just now, so I'm just taking a break.

options.text: You're not bothering me at all.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Joezen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ehehe, that's good!
Actually, the photoshoot just reached a good stopping point, and I'm now on break.

name: Joezen
text:
By the way, how does this swimsuit look on me!?
My father... the Captain found this
at a shop in Enoshima and bought it for me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Joezen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Thank you very much!
I don't know much about fashion, so I'm relieved to hear you say that.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Joezen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Thank god, I'm relieved!
I also like the design, so I'm glad you liked it too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Joezen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You think so too?
The Captain is really reliable when it comes to fashion and fun.

name: Joezen
text:
...By the way, [Player]-san.
What is that you're holding in your hand?
I saw it at the souvenir shop.

options.text: It's a local specialty sun oil.
(Hand over what you're holding to Joezen)

name: Joezen
text:
Is that sun oil?
It looks quite different
from Estevolta's.

name: Joezen
text:
Oh~ so this is how it's sold in Enoshima.
It's made from Earth plants, huh.
The bottle is pretty lovely too!

name: Joezen
text:
[Player]-san, if you don't mind,
can I use this sun oil too?

name: Joezen
text:
What, you'll apply it for me!?
No, I can't possibly
be that spoiled!

name: Joezen
text:
Well, it's certainly difficult to apply to my own back,
but if it's not too much trouble,
can I ask you to do it for me?

name: Joezen
text:
Yes, I'm ready!
Well then, [Player]-san,
I'm counting on you.

name: Joezen
text:
...To be honest, I've only used sun oil
a handful of times until now.
Or rather, I haven't had the opportunity to.

name: Joezen
text:
So, being like this, it feels like
an event on a special day just for me...
Ehehe. I feel very happy!

name: Joezen
text:
—Huh!? Sorry, I almost
fell asleep! Being caressed by
your hand feels so good...

[Player] and Joezen enjoyed
their intimate time together.

name: Joezen
text:
Thank you very much,
[Player]-san!
Now, it's my turn.

name: Joezen
text:
Don't hold back on me,
because I'll definitely repay you
for all your help!
